HEADER.HEADER_ABOUT: Information Technology Engineer, specialized in FullStack development and data analysis. With more than two years of experience creating efficient, scalable and well-structured applications.

ABOUTME.ABOUT_ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: I am a web developer specialized in creating complete applications from interface design to logic implementation on the server. I have experience in databases and application deployment, ensuring optimal performance and a smooth user experience. Additionally, I have mastered version control through Git and use Power BI for data analysis, allowing me to make informed decisions based on metrics.

404.404_BODY: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

UNIVERSITY.UNIVERSITY_TITLE: Polytechnic University of the Valley of Mexico (UPVM)
UNIVERSITY.UNIVERSITY_TEXT: During my time at university, I learned about various areas of IT such as equipment maintenance, networking, object-oriented programming, mobile development with Xamarin, cybersecurity, requirements engineering, and databases. I also worked with Arduino in robotics. However, what interested me the most was web development. Although I only learned basic jQuery concepts, I always had the desire to continue learning about this topic. Currently, I am self-taught and strive to learn something new every day.

FORM.FORM_DESCRIPTION: I'm available for freelance work. Connect with me via Telegram, the message will be sent through a ChatBot.
FORM.FORM_TITLE_SMALL_SUBHEADER: I'M HERE FOR WHATEVER YOU NEED AND YOU CAN CONTACT ME
FORM.FORM_SUBTITLE_SUBHEAD: Looking for high-quality system solutions tailored to your needs? Contact me.
